atm9.quest.welcome.welcome: 欢迎来到All The Mods 9 to the sky!
atm9.quest.welcome.desc.welcome:
欢迎来到ATM9... 现在是空岛版！ 
 
 要开始任务，请点击左侧选项卡！ 
 
 如果你是ATM模组包的新手, 请务必查看 &aAllthemodium&r 章节！ 
 
 如果你是空岛整合包或MC整合包的新手, 可以查看&6主线任务章节&r 来帮助你开始。 
 
 注意：  模组并不受任务的限制，任务是可选的。
atm9.quest.allthemodium.desc.intro1: &dAllthemodium模组&r 是所有ATM模组包的核心模组。 这个模组为世界添加了游戏末期的一些矿石来改善你的模组包体验。 但是在ATM9S中, 你得到它们的方式和普通世界中有一点儿不同
atm9.quest.allthemodium.desc.pulv: 磨粉机将是你制作注灵锭的第一步，这是合成ATM锭所必需的。 先粉碎一些锡来获得磷灰石, 然后粉碎一些灵魂沙获取灵魂沙碎末！
atm9.quest.allthemodium.desc.soulinfused: 先制作一些注灵粉，然后熔炼它们。
atm9.quest.allthemodium.desc.arcane: 你需要一些神秘水晶粉末来制作ATM锭, 但是它们并不常见. 继续筛大量的粉尘来获得它们！ (使用铁筛网/钻石筛网)
atm9.quest.allthemodium.desc.Mundabitur: 洁净粉末真的很难制作, 所以我建议直接从末地掠夺它们。
atm9.quest.allthemodium.desc.Powah: 制作下界水晶是合成ATM锭最难的部分， 你必须通过 &6Powah&r 模组 来得到它. 去看任务线！ \n \n注意： 通过Powah模组充能实际上是制作ATM锭的方法之一
atm9.quest.allthemodium.desc.alloysmelt: 一个简单的合金炉， 将金、红石、萤石融合在一起来得到你的充能合金锭。
atm9.quest.allthemodium.desc.osmiumcompr: 在锇压缩机中将锇和萤石融合来得到红石充能锭
atm9.quest.allthemodium.desc.atmblock: 使用ATM块可以让你制作无限的ATM锭，制作方式在左侧！
atm9.quest.allthemodium.desc.laserbase: 镭射钻基座使用非常简单， 而且是制作&6ATM锭&r的最佳方式. 放置一个镭射钻基座并将镭射钻放到它的侧面(面朝下)。 然后在镭射钻基座左侧槽位放置一个ATM块，最后给它们提供能量
atm9.quest.allthemodium.desc.bucketoflif: 深入研究&4&l血魔法&r&r 来制作它
atm9.quest.allthemodium.desc.insanium: 深入研究&a神秘农业&r来制作它
atm9.quest.allthemodium.desc.ars: 深入研究&d新生魔艺&r来制作它
atm9.quest.allthemodium.desc.atmingredie: 用作在召唤祭坛制作振金锭的催化剂
atm9.quest.allthemodium.desc.vibblock: 与ATM块相同，使用它可以制作无限的振金锭。
atm9.quest.allthemodium.desc.vibinfo: 振金的工具和装备只能通过振金锻造模板获得 那么去做一个镭射钻基座...
atm9.quest.allthemodium.desc.atm_apple: 几乎像一个附魔金苹果
atm9.quest.allthemodium.desc.atm_armor: ATM装备、振金装备、难得素装备, 都需要锻造模板。 这太疯狂了...
atm9.quest.allthemodium.desc.unob_ore: 一种仅在末地高岛群系生成的极其罕见的矿石
atm9.quest.allthemodium.desc.atm_smith: 这可以用大量的ATM锭制作... 讲真的, 这时候制作一个镭射钻基座吧
atm9.quest.allthemodium.desc.vib_smith: 与ATM锻造模板相同, 需要大量的振金锭. 镭射钻基座怎么样？
atm9.quest.allthemodium.desc.unob_smith: 它可以在the Other维度的地牢的图书馆里找到
atm9.quest.allthemodium.desc.atm_tools: 注意: 尽管&a升级模板&r不是制作初始工具所必须的, 但是它会帮你节约大量的&6ATM锭&r! \n \n这些工具是无限耐久的！
atm9.quest.allthemodium.desc.furnace: &6ATM锭&r可以制作熔炼速度极快的熔炉! ATM熔炉每次可以熔炼16个物品 (比下界合金熔炉快16倍).
atm9.quest.allthemodium.desc.bees: 需要更多&6ATM锭&r? 养一些蜜蜂吧！ \n \n加装升级：生产力Omega后比镭射钻基座效率还要高 (或者养大量的蜜蜂).
atm9.quest.allthemodium.subt.flux-inf: 这里面最容易制作的物品
atm9.quest.bounty.trader: 杀死流浪商人和烦人的羊驼
atm9.quest.bounty.desc.board1: 在这里，杀死敌人可以获得奖励
atm9.quest.bounty.desc.trader1: '当我们正在制作ATM7的任务线时, 流浪商人不断骚扰我，他自认为很幽默
atm9.quest.bounty.subt.chimera: 这甚至还不是我的最终形态
atm9.quest.tips.shrink: '亲爱的 我把自己缩小了'
atm9.quest.tips.desc.tricks: 在此页面上，你将找到一些有用的项目和信息，以帮助你完成旅程！
atm9.quest.tips.desc.wand: &9建筑之杖&r模组 添加了一些实用的魔杖来方便你进行建筑 \n \n 当使用魔杖右键方块的某个面时, 只要你的物品栏中有足够的方块，它就会把这个面延伸。
atm9.quest.tips.desc.build: 一些实用的建筑工具 \n \n &c破坏工具可以清除方块！&r
atm9.quest.tips.desc.shrink: 有没有想过长高？变矮？或者让生物更高或更矮？ 那么个人缩放装置就是你的完美选择！ \n \n右键单击以更改设备配置的大小。 Shift+右键来改变自己的大小，左键其他生物改变它们的大小
atm9.quest.tips.desc.hyperbox: 这整个房间在一个区块里 \n \n这个大小适合所有人! 空间不够？ 那就多做几个！
atm9.quest.tips.desc.gale: 如果你不熟悉，疾风戒指，是一种创造飞行的方法！ 它消耗少量的EMC的运行 \n \n 在使用转化桌之前, 我们推荐使用红石/萤石, 或者卡莱恩之星，这是等价交换模组的电池, 你可以在等价交换模组中研究它们。
atm9.quest.tips.desc.sink: 制作无限水的方法 \n \n 需要更多水? 那就多做几个！
atm9.quest.tips.desc.magnet: 这是一个简易磁铁！ \n \n 专业提示： 你可以设置快捷键绑定来打开和关闭此功能！
atm9.quest.tips.desc.gateway: 永恒之门模组是早期获取材料的好方法。 使用时，它们会生成一波又一波的敌人，并具有惩罚或增益效果。 在所有敌人被击败后，它会掉落奖励！ 这也是早期获得羊、牛、猪和鸡的好方法！
atm9.quest.tips.desc.repair: 这东西非常便宜，而且可以修理你物品栏中的工具！
atm9.quest.tips.desc.torch: 火炬大师模组带来了一堆新的实用物品和方块。 巨型火把可以防止敌对生物的生成, 而恐惧之灯则是防止友好生物的生成。 狂野闪耀之灯放下后会在它周围随机生成光源， 寒冻珍珠可以用来清除这些光源。
atm9.quest.tips.desc.sleepcharm: 你是否厌倦了所有那些烦人的幻翼强迫你睡觉？ 如果是这样，那么睡眠魔符就是为你准备的！ \n \n 可以装备睡眠魔符，来确保不睡觉时不再生成烦人的幻翼
atm9.quest.tips.subt.hyperbox: 当一个无限的世界太小时
atm9.quest.start1.crook: 是不是歪了, 还是我的眼花了？
atm9.quest.start1.shears: 燧石剪刀， 比铁制的便宜！
atm9.quest.start1.desc.headstart: 对于那些想要快速开局的人, 为你提供了一个“简单模式”的开局。 你不必非要完成此任务，并且这对于整个进度来说也是可选的。
atm9.quest.start1.desc.emergency: 树苗用完了？你可以在任务页面的右上角获得一些应急树苗！
atm9.quest.start1.desc.start:
欢迎来到 All The Mods 9： To the Sky！ 
 
如果你玩过原版（或任何空岛模组包），在制作ATM锭之前，你要做的大部分事情都应该是不言自明的。 
 
 如果你不知道要做什么，不要害怕！这些任务将指导你开始。 
 
 本章中的一些任务有游戏中内置的视频风格的思考教程！ 他们将作为奖励给予。 点击奖励观看思考教程，它会教你关于该物品的知识
atm9.quest.start1.desc.log: 砍倒这棵树。 \n \n&9重要提示&r： 是的，作为一个空岛模组包，你可以蹲起让任何作物，包括树木，长得更快。
atm9.quest.start1.desc.crook: 钩子会让你从树叶中得到树苗和苹果的几率增加，并且有几率得到蚕。 你将需要一些蚕来获取线以进行进一步的发展。
atm9.quest.start1.desc.string: 要在空岛中中获得线，有些人可能会说它比以前更容易...... 你可以种一棵树，在其中一片叶子上加一只蚕，然后看着它们感染到所有的树叶上！ 等到完全感染后，用你的钩子收获感染的树叶以得到线
atm9.quest.start1.desc.mesh: 筛子是你在这个模组包中收集资源的最常见方法，大多数材料都可以通过这种方式获得！ \n \n 你也可以通过制作25个橡木筛子，把它们摆放成5x5，右键最中间的筛子来一次性筛25个方块，要注意每个筛子中都放置筛网。
atm9.quest.start1.desc.bigsieve: 将9个方块合成为它的压缩形态,然后放入筛子中.. It's 9x faster after all这将比之前快9倍
atm9.quest.start1.desc.stone: 就像其他空岛模组包一样，你可以shift+右键点击草地来获得圆石石子，但这里的方式略有不同。 \n \n你有50%%的机会获得圆石石子，有50%%的机会获得其它石子。
atm9.quest.start1.desc.compression:
在空岛中，你会得到很多需要处理的基础物品，比如圆石、沙子和尘土。 
 
 为了节省空间，你可以通过在工作台上使用9个方块来压缩它们。 
 
如果你想批量锤它们，你需要......
atm9.quest.start1.desc.hammersss: 锤沙砾或沙子的更快方法是锤它们的压缩块。 不过，普通的锤子是行不通的， 所以你需要一把压缩锤！
atm9.quest.start1.desc.hammer: 为了获得资源，我们需要把圆石锤成可以筛的物品。 \n \n这就是锤子的作用。 放下你想要锤的方块，然后......锤它。
atm9.quest.start1.desc.gravel: 大部分开始旅程都是通过筛子获取材料。 我们将在下一个任务中了解更多信息。 \n \n 不要害怕制造成吨的沙砾。筛沙砾是你进步的方式！
atm9.quest.start1.desc.shears: 剪刀但是是燧石的.. 使用它来收集树叶
atm9.quest.start1.desc.leaves: 准备好用这些树叶制造水吧！
atm9.quest.start1.desc.ready: 你将要筛很多方块。使用FTB Ultimine模组用锤子快速收集，也许可以准备好自动点击器！ \n \n你可以放置多个筛子，一次最多筛25个方块。
atm9.quest.start1.desc.flintmesh: 使用燧石筛网，你将开始获得一些实用的资源. \n \n如果你想知道筛矿时每个筛网会掉落什么， 你可以随时在筛网的JEI中点击“U”以查看列表。
atm9.quest.start1.desc.drops: 有时候，低级别的筛网会比高级别的筛网掉落更多的战利品！请务必检查 JEI中的掉落概率
atm9.quest.start1.desc.furnace: 一旦你有了燧石筛网，你就可以开始通过筛分获得基本材料，比如铁！ \n \n 将矿石碎块进行合成，让它们变成原矿，然后把它们扔进熔炉里冶炼它们！
atm9.quest.start1.desc.ironfurnace: 如果你在工作台上将原版熔炉围一圈铁锭，你可以将你的熔炉升级为铁熔炉。 \n \n 铁熔炉熔炼速度更快，也可以点击左上角的齿轮进行来配置输入输出进行自动化
atm9.quest.start1.desc.gen: 有很多方法可以发电。 \n \n RFTools模组的燃煤发电机是最简单的发电机之一。
atm9.quest.start1.desc.part2: 如果我们想开始在ATM9：TTS中实现自动化， 我们需要进一步发展电力 \n \n要继续我们的进展，请查看 &a入门：第 2 部分&r，以继续前进！
atm9.quest.start1.desc.barrel:
桶是在这个包中获取材料的最重要方式之一， 仅次于筛子。 
 
 桶可以用水制作黏土，用巫水制作灵魂沙，甚至可以用树苗制作泥土。 
 
注意：下雨时桶里会装满水。
atm9.quest.start1.desc.witchwater: 把一个桶放在菌丝体上方并装满水时，它会产生巫水。 巫水可以用来制作灵魂沙、下界岩和黑石。 \n \n&l查看巫水桶的JEI&r
atm9.quest.start1.desc.slime: 这个配方已经被修改了，配方现在是将牛奶添加到有水的桶中。
atm9.quest.start1.desc.clay: 将桶装满水，然后用尘土右键单击它以获得黏土。
atm9.quest.start1.desc.bone: 将尘土扔进筛子里，得到一些骨粉。
atm9.quest.start1.desc.crucible: 我的意思是这是一个空岛模组包，无论我们在这些任务中试图向你展示多少种不同的发电方法，你最终都会在你的基地中使用各种各样的发电方法...... \n \n 当热源放置在其下方时，它会产生熔岩。一开始你可以使用火把，尽管它很慢。 使用一些圆石来填充它。
atm9.quest.start1.desc.heat:
坩埚的热源很重要，因为它们可以更快地产生熔岩！ 这个模组包对选项进行了一些更改，所以我想我会在JEI中添加一个列表，以便你向你展示可选项 
 
 烈焰网： 8 
 铀块： 20 
 通用机械模组中的发热元件： 60 
 暗物质块： 100
atm9.quest.start1.desc.lava: 将圆石加入坩埚中，在下面放置热源，你就得到了熔岩！ \n \n 将漏斗放到坩埚上以自动放入圆石，一个坩埚中最多可容纳4桶熔岩
atm9.quest.start1.desc.cobble1:
如果你不想一直右键草地，那就做一个圆石制造机。 
 
 你需要在你的坩埚里制造熔岩，你需要足够的铁来制造2个桶。 
 
 相信我，这是值得的。它会自动生成圆石，并会自动输出到容器中，例如功能性存储模组中的橡木抽屉。
atm9.quest.start1.desc.farm: 通过筛泥土来获取种子，然后种植你的作物！
atm9.quest.start1.desc.toast: 吐司......几乎和牛排一样好吃！
atm9.quest.start1.desc.food: 通过查看 &a食物与农业&r章节了解所有关于食物的知识。
atm9.quest.start1.desc.ma: &a神秘农业&r模组是一种获得大量战利品的简单方法，甚至不需要电！去看看吧。
atm9.quest.start1.desc.dank: Dank 就像一个迷你潜影盒，它可以自动在其中存储某些类型的物品。 \n \n筛物品时掉落了很多烦人的石子，不过你可以在Dank中存放一千多颗石子！ 右键单击以打开Dank的GUI，将石子放入其中，然后单击顶部的“P”将其设置为过滤拾取。 现在，它把所有的石子都捡起来！
atm9.quest.start1.desc.stonebarrel: 石桶与熔岩一起使用。可以制作黑石等其他物品。
atm9.quest.start1.desc.usefulseeds: 用这些种子右键泥土将使泥土变成草方块或菌丝体。它们会蔓延！
atm9.quest.start1.desc.drawer: 把这个东西放在你的圆石制造机上方，它会自动压缩生成的圆石，左键点击提取！
atm9.quest.start1.desc.soulsand: 使用机械动力模组的&b批量缠魂&r，你可以将沙子转换为灵魂沙。 使用一个鼓风机吹过灵魂营火，它会将另一边的沙子转化为灵魂沙。
atm9.quest.start1.desc.dirt: 你可以用沙砾和泥土来制造砂土，然后用&b锄头耕作它来制造耕地，破坏后得到双倍泥土。（牺牲沙砾）
atm9.quest.start1.desc.squeezer: 在里面放一个矿石，然后跳上去，将矿石挤成2个原矿石粉末（有时）。给它一个红石信号，可以在挤压完成后重置它。\n \n提示：在上面放置一些盔甲架
atm9.quest.start1.subt.headstart: 对于那些想要跳过初期的人
atm9.quest.start1.subt.compression: 它只是节省了空间和时间！
atm9.quest.start1.subt.hammer: 一个完全被过度使用的笑话
atm9.quest.start1.subt.ironfurnace: 这个包中的所有东西都会升级吗？
atm9.quest.start2.enrichment: 坚持使用通用机械模组！
atm9.quest.start2.automated: 使用通用机械模组的自动化矿石冶炼
atm9.quest.start2.ore: 热力系列模组的的自动化矿石冶炼
atm9.quest.start2.usingpower: 是时候使用我们的电力了......
atm9.quest.start2.desc.more:
作为一个空岛模组包，每个人都知道熔岩的重要性，它经常被用到，有些人甚至直到结束还在使用它 
 
确保你的电缆连接到红色部分以提取电力。
 
提示：你可以使用 AlltheOres的矿锤将锭变成粉末，然后制作殷钢锭，直到你拥有一台可以这样做的机器为止
atm9.quest.start2.desc.morepower: 单个风力发电机的发电量并不大，因此这里有一些方法可以发电！
atm9.quest.start2.desc.orehammer: 这把锤子可以用来把矿石变成粉末，比例是1比2！你现在可以用这把锤子将所有矿石加倍，甚至可以制造钢粉。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.projecte: 去查看&a等价交换&r任务线，看看如何使用这个模组来获取大量资源！
atm9.quest.start2.desc.mobfarm: 很多资源都来自空岛的怪物，最重要的是骨粉和末影珍珠。 \n \n首先，在离你大约30个方块的地方做一个没有光的平台，或者做一个标准的原版怪物农场。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.passivemobs: 牛、羊、鸡，都需要草方块来产生。 要么在很远的地方建一个泥土平台，在中心用草种子，要么建造这个门，为你生成这些动物！ \n \n注意：当你使用它时，会有一个小爆炸。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.steel: 钢锭是许多机器非常重要的制作原料，通过制造钢粉来获得一些.
atm9.quest.start2.desc.steeld: 一个矿锤、4个煤和铁粉。不是一个很好的配方，但你会需要这个..
atm9.quest.start2.desc.cables: 这些电缆就它们可以传输的电力而言确实很便宜，而且值得制造。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.ironfurnaces: 铁熔炉可用于发电，也可以利用电力进行冶炼。最重要的是，它比原版熔炉更快。非常有用。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.augmentg: 强化组件：发电机将熔炉变成发电机，这使它几乎与之前的煤炭发电机相同，只是还不是很好。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.augmentb: 如果你把它与强化组件：发电机结合起来，你可以将青金石、铁、钻石等熔炼成能量。这会产生更多的能量，并且可以提供很好的提升。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.crusher: 粉碎机可以将有机产品（如土豆）粉碎成生物燃料。供生物能发电机使用（非常好）。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.biofuel: 土豆非常适合加工为生物燃料，请查看&e神秘农业&r以获取良好的早期农场设计。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.covdust: 通过使用&a等价交换&r，共价粉被转化为其他资源。这些将很快被使用。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.energycondenser: 能量凝聚器是一个非常简单的转换器，它可以将具有EMC值的物品从一个转换为另一个，只需将其放在左上角的插槽中并添加一些共价粉即可。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.applied: 这绝对是这个包中首选的存储系统，因为它与&a等价交换&r兼容，并且有&bApplied Flux&r模组以实现惊人的电力存储。 \n \n先进的存储系统。 它可以实现最完美的自动化和自动合成，但它比精制存储更难学习。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.refined: 更简单的存储系统。 允许良好的自动制作和大量的物品存储，但在使用没有类型限制的磁盘时要小心，扔进太多不同的物品，你的世界不会喜欢它。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.phyto: 给定水、电，肥料（可选），将自动种植你放入的任何种子。\n \n查看&e神秘农业&r了解更多信息。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.augmentf: 强化组件：工厂使铁熔炉使用电力而不是燃料。\n \n&l这使它们变得更好&r
atm9.quest.start2.desc.crafter: 这比通量压缩机更容易制作，而且速度更快。将制作配方设置为自动制造矿石，并给机器通电。 \n \n&l点击底部的小蜗牛图标，合成会变得更快&r
atm9.quest.start2.desc.speedup: 通用机械的机器并不是很快，但如果你给它们一些速度卡，它们可以快10倍。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.tier: 工厂安装器可以增加机器的插槽数量。你可以通过这种方式注入或富集更多的矿石。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.thermogen: 热力发电机只需要一个热源和一些水来发电。 把它放在熔岩上方，加入水，它就能发电。 \n \n我建议查看 &ePowah&r 任务线以获取更多信息。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.blazing: 烈焰晶体块作为热源，使热力发电机的发电量增加了280%，疯狂
atm9.quest.start2.desc.demonseeds: 通过打草来获取这些种子。 这些是 &a神秘学&r模组所必需的，你必须使用它才能获得你的第一个下界锻造模板。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.NTemplate:
被附身的霍格林掉落了一个下界锻造模板。 要召唤它，你需要做阿巴拉斯强令召唤术。 首先完成&a神秘学&r任务线，然后在完成&a记下来&r任务后返回。 
 
完成后，在《魔灵全典》中找到阿巴拉斯强令召唤术。 在书中打开它，点击显示窗口左下角的小眼睛，显示仪式的示意图。所有物品都放进去后，在金色献祭之碗附近杀死一头猪，开始仪式。 
 
提示：在被附身的猪身上使用怪物棉签制作刷怪蛋。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.UniPipe: 通用管道可以传输一切。电力、液体、气体和物品！ \n \n注意：很多管道会变得滞后，所以我建议将来使用其他模组，例如AE2来传输物品。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.Moss: 4个草种子可以用来制作苔藓块。 苔藓块将用于开始&d新生魔艺&r，这是一个非常强大的魔法模组。在这个模组包中，我们将用它来制造村民。 \n \n有机灌注机可以复制苔藓块, 或者你可以将它们放入 &a能量凝聚器&r 中。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.Ars: 这些树苗是种植至高木所必需的，至高木是新生魔艺模组在其大部分制作配方中使用的神奇木材。 你可以使用&6操纵之精华&r将树苗从一个变成另一个。 如果你还没有，去看看任务线。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.BlazeGate: 产生一群烈焰人。确保你有远程武器！\n \n注意：数百根烈焰棒
atm9.quest.start2.desc.EnderGate: 产生一堆末影人。在你的头上建造一个屋顶！\n \n注意：数百颗末影珍珠
atm9.quest.start2.desc.village: 将魔源罐放在仪式火盆附近，并在其上使用召唤之板，然后用手右键单击火盆。 \n \n注意：在距离其他结构约 20个方块的地方执行此操作。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.netherstar: 杀死凋零并获得你的第一颗下界之星，随着你的进展，这些将非常有用。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.netherstarseeds: 下界之星种子是获得无限下界之星的最简单方法。使用有机灌注机！
atm9.quest.start2.desc.infinitywand: 无尽手杖是无限耐久的，可以放置大量方块，对于建造平台来说非常好。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.angelring: 天使戒指让你飞翔，就好像你处于创造模式一样。但是为什么？有喷气背包..
atm9.quest.start2.desc.tiab: 使用时间之瓶Shift单击以加速机器，实际上，可以加速任何东西！随着时间的流逝而积累时间。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.SummoningAltar: 召唤祭坛可以用来制作像牛一样简单的东西，也可以用来制作&6&lATM之星&r&r \n \n检查JEI的用途。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.Fisher: 钓鱼机是获取海洋物品的最佳方式。 去访问 &b工业先锋&r来帮助你制作。 它需要一个至少5个方块宽的水池才能工作，如果没有工作，就扩大水池。 (给它供电) \n \n这可以给你附魔书、墨囊、鱼等等，非常值得。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.sieve:
欢迎使用自定义的自动筛子！没有升级，它的速度很慢。 
 
这些机器没有输出栏，筛子输出到底部，锤子输出到前面，两者都是自动输出的，因此你可以在没有任何管道的情况下构建整个系统 
 
注意*这些机器在库存已满的情况下将无法运行，下图使用pipez作为产物输出的示例，如果像下图一样建造而没有适当的过滤，那么它将不会工作。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.compactor: 将所有的矿碎块压成原矿石，和筛子一样， 这台机器也是从底部输出
atm9.quest.start2.desc.gold: 金升级和钻石升级可以叠加3个，将鼠标悬停在升级上可查看每个升级的数字！
atm9.quest.start2.desc.chance:
磨粉机是一种基本的热力机器，用于将1个原矿石加工成1个粉末，有 25%% 的机会产生另一种粉末。这通常意味着大约25%%的几率产生更多的锭。 
 
 确保为其连接电源！ 
 
 *注意：磨粉机也可以升级。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.jetpack: 这是我们要制作的第一个喷气背包。 不过，它不会储存很多电。 通用机械的能量立方可以用来给它充电。 \n \n以后可以用通量网络模组或powah模组的玩家供电仪获得无线电力传输。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.infuser:
让我们做一个冶金灌注机。 
 
 这台机器使我们能够制造几种材料，这些材料将来可用于发电和更多机器。 
 
将红石放入黄色槽中，将铁放入蓝色槽中，制成灌注合金。 冶金灌注机总会有一个催化剂，比如红石，然后是被注入的实际物品。在这种情况下是铁。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.wind: 风力发电机真的很方便，因为你需要做的就是把它放下即可使其工作。 \n \n把它放在高空，让它有更大的发电量！
atm9.quest.start2.desc.connection:
首先，通用机械模组有一种更好的电力传输方式， 但是，如果你还没有钢锭，以下是你需要了解的内容： 我们需要一种方法将风力发电机产生的电力进行传输 
 
来吧，给自己做一些PipeZ模组的能量管道和管道扳手。 你需要管道扳手来使能量管道提取电力。
 
注意：要使管道提取电力，请在连接到风力发电机的管道上右键单击。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.pipe: 所有Pipez模组的管道都可以通过管道升级进行升级。 这使它们能够进行高级过滤。 \n \n要添加管道升级，请在当前设置为提取模式的管道上右键单击。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.storage:
基础能量立方充当移动电源。 
 
你还可以将需要充电的物品放在插槽中来充电！ 
 
这意味着是时候起飞了！
atm9.quest.start2.desc.building: 这个需要供电的物品可以为你放置方块。 \n \n 要使用它，请确保在快捷键键绑定设置的“建造工具”类别下找到“设置”键绑定。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.enrichment:
富集仓可以富集矿石，如红石或煤炭，来让它们在冶金灌注机内有更大的利用率。 
 
 如果你想要更容易的获得钢锭，富集一些煤炭得到富集碳，然后用冶金灌注机将碳灌注到铁中得到富集铁，然后再用碳再次灌注富集铁得到钢粉。 
 
 注意：现在，如果你放入矿石，你可以通过让它变成粉末来使其加倍，以后这台机器会被用来建造一个高效的矿石工厂。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.automated:
为了使用通用机械模组进行自动矿石冶炼, 将富集仓放在铁熔炉的左侧，并在两者的上方放置一个箱子。 
 
 在富集仓中，使用“侧面配置”设置向右输出。 确保按下“自动弹出”按钮。 
 
 要将物品放入富集仓，你需要一根管道将上方的箱子连接到机器。 你可以使用 &aPipez&r的物品管道或&9通用机械&r的基础物流管道来完成。 
 
 在铁熔炉中，你需要将其设置为左侧的输入，并将其设置为顶部的输出。 确保选择了自动输入和输出。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.mekanism: 要开始使用通用机械，请查看 &6科技&r组中的&a通用机械&r章节。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.ore:
要设置自动矿石冶炼，请将磨粉机直接放在铁熔炉的左侧。 
 
 然后在两个机器上方放置箱子，然后使用磨粉机中的齿轮来配置输入和输出。 将顶面变为蓝色（输入），将右面变为红色（输出）。确保按下“自动输出”和“自动输入”按钮。 
 
 在铁炉中，你将执行相同的操作，除了从左侧输入，从顶部输出。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.thermal: 热力系列是一个简单的发电模组！查看 &6热力系列&r章节以开始使用！
atm9.quest.start2.desc.furnace: 铁熔炉可以一直升级到彩虹熔炉。\n \n 是时候升级了！
atm9.quest.start2.desc.wireless: 将无线热能供应器连接到你的供电系统。将供应器与接收器连接起来, 然后将无线热能接收器作为燃料放入熔炉中。 \n \n这将为熔炉提供无线电力！
atm9.quest.start2.desc.summon: 如果你所在的服务器已经杀死了末影龙，你需要重新召唤它。 \n \n 取4个末地水晶，在出口的每个面各放1个。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.end: 如果你还不知道，末地不仅仅是杀死末影龙。 \n \n 一旦末影龙被杀死，你会发现一个奇怪的 “结构 ”，在3个方块之间有一个传送门。 拿一颗末影珍珠，扔进传送门。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.elytra: 在末地的某个地方，你会发现一艘漂浮的船。 \n \n 消灭那里的敌人，进入战利品室，你会找到自己的第一个鞘翅。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.teleport: 2个指路石可用于相互传送。 吃完蛋糕后，它就消失了......但是，如果你在末地放置了指路石，你就可以随时返回末地
atm9.quest.start2.subt.filterdest: 管道升级允许过滤输入端的物品，但不允许过滤输出端的物品。 \n \n使用此工具选择一个输出，然后在管道升级的过滤器GUI中进行过滤。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.superheat: 如果你要用熔岩来发电。 当你把坩埚放在发热元件上面时，它们=会使熔岩的生成速度快60倍。 \n \n这时候你应该用管道来输入圆石
atm9.quest.start2.desc.tank: 它可以储存你所有的熔岩！好吧，最多32桶。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.compact: 这将在箱子或背包里把所有东西进行压制。 矿石碎块将变成原矿石，钻石/绿宝石/煤炭等将被压成块。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.totem: 有些生物周围会有粒子效果环绕，当你杀死它们时，它们会掉落一个&e能力图腾&r。 右键单击以打开GUI，然后选择能力，然后单击按钮将它们添加到你的角色中。 \n \n你可以使用多个相同的图腾来升级药水效果，例如：&b速度I&r -> &b速度II&r. &b饱和&r效果可以使你再也不必吃东西了！ 要移除它们，请使用 &e能力瓶&r。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.flux:
通量网络模组是电力传输的最优解。 首先通过执行以下方式在&b末地&r获得通量粉尘： 
 
1. 前往末地岛的中心。 
 
2.将&c红石&r扔到基岩上 
 
3. 将一块黑曜石放在基岩上方一格，然后左键点击黑曜石，将红石变成通量粉尘。 一旦你有了通量方块后，你就可以不使用基岩了。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.fluxuse:
&l请阅读以了解通量网络的工作原理&r。 
 
&b通量网络输入点&r 向网络中增加能量。 放置一个通量网络输入点，打开它，单击右上角的加号以创建一个新网络。 
 
&b通量网络接入点&r从网络中移除能量。 你可以制作多个通量网络输入点和通量网络接入点。 要使用通量网络接入点：把它放到要使用的机器上，右键单击它，在菜单图标（顶部的第二个按钮）中选择你建立的通量网络。 如果你需要更多电力，请在 通量网络接入点和通量网络输入点中启用绕过上限。 
 
&b通量网络控制器&r可以为玩家提供无限电力（只要所在区块被加载）。 选择顶部菜单中的第三个选项卡，选择你所需要电力的位置，然后启用无线充电！
atm9.quest.start2.desc.final: 完成了基础知识，是时候看看我们需要做些什么来获得 &6&lATM之星&r&r了。 这并不容易......
atm9.quest.start2.desc.laserlens: 将其放在 &6镭射钻基座&r的左侧插槽中来让它开始工作！ 至少白色镭射激光聚焦透镜是这样工作的。 检查JEI以查看使用其他透镜可以挖掘哪些矿石
atm9.quest.start2.desc.piglich: 你可以召唤一个猪巫妖以获得制作ATM之星的&e猪巫妖之心块&r。不过，这是非常昂贵的，所以现在不用着急。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.emerald: 你可以用绿宝石来制作工具和装备就像你使用钻石一样（绿宝石会更好）。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.laserbase: 好了，现在你必须按照&6Allthemodium&r章节中的建议制作一个镭射钻基座。这对于获得某些无法获得的矿石（例如&b氟石&r）是必要的，这是&d通用机械&r所必需的。 在中间放置一个镭射钻基座，然后在其周围朝向镭射钻基座放置镭射钻（使它们指向下方）。 \n \n你可以放置比以下示例多得多的钻头，但你也可以像下面这样做。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.ice: 你可以通过在桶中混合雪球和水来获得冰。 或者，你可以使用最简单的方法，使用炼金化学模组（将水泵入雾化器中制作H2O，然后使用压缩机）， 或者发展一下&a植物魔法&r。 \n \n如果你选择雪球，我建议使用&bAE2&r的&b熵变机械臂&r。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.igneous: 在你得到自动筛子之前，你应该知道这一点！造石机能生成许多用于粉碎的石头， 你必须将指定方块放在造石机下方/两侧，比如，如果你把它放在熔岩和水之间，它会制造圆石。 \n \n与往常一样，检查JEI以了解你可以使用这台机器做什么。
atm9.quest.start2.desc.magmator: 岩浆发电机一开始表现就很好， 随着你的升级，它会变得更好。 它只需要源源不断的熔岩， 有了发热元件，这不是问题！
atm9.quest.start2.subt.storage: 通用机械模组可以做到一切！
atm9.quest.start2.subt.cake: 在空岛上，没有末地传送门供你寻找，你所要做的就是品尝（略带酸味的）末地蛋糕，然后踏上去往末地的路上！
atm9.quest.start2.subt.elytra: 但是我们有一个喷气背包？
atm9.quest.start3.desc.start: 对不起，伙计，你想得到ATM之星就必须完成这一章，就像完成入门：第二部分一样！
atm9.quest.start3.desc.altar: 这次我们没有使用机械动力，我们使用的是召唤仪式。 将召唤祭坛放在下界之星块上方，然后收集物品。 把所需要的物品放进去，在仪式附近有一个放一个坚守者（检查JEI），然后最后把红物质放进去。 然后。。。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.warden: 要制作一个ATM之星，你需要献祭一个坚守者。 要做到这一点，你需要一个坚守者。你可以通过筛末地石来获得幽匿尖啸体，并在幽匿尖啸体上使用幽匿核心来召唤坚守者。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.blackhole: 需要大量方块来制作它
atm9.quest.start3.desc.ars: 新生魔艺是一个基于魔源的法术模组。 它可以制作许多物品，如法术书、使魔和许多其他物品。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.botania: 植物魔法是基于神秘花和魔力的模组。 花可以做很多事情，但所有花朵要么制造魔力，要么使用魔力。 它们可以做自动冶炼，破坏方块等工作。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.blood: 血魔法是一个基于... 嗯，来自被你杀死的生物的血。 用这种血液来制作生命精华，可以用来制作很多东西。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.forbidden: 禁忌与奥秘与其他法术模组不同，它更多地用于工具和装备。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.force: 力量工艺是另一个不同的法术模组，事实上有些人可能会说它甚至不是一个法术模组！我们主要使用它提供的物品和方块
atm9.quest.start3.desc.occult: 神秘学利用恶魔来实现自动化。可以做自动化怪物农场或矿石翻倍，恶魔能做的你都可以让他们去做！
atm9.quest.start3.desc.reliquary: 圣遗物模组完全基于怪物掉落。你可以使用这些稀有掉落物来制作普通掉落物，或将它们组合在一起以制作独特的工具和护身符。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.advanced: 高级发电机模组用于制作定制的核反应堆和涡轮机。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.hnn: 敌对神经网络模组是一个生产怪物掉落物的模组。你从制作数据模型开始，然后不断杀死怪物来升级它们。然后，你可以对其进行模拟以获得...
atm9.quest.start3.desc.mystical: 神秘农业模组适用于那些想种植一切的人
atm9.quest.start3.desc.powah: Powah模组为你提供了不同级别的发电方式。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.bees: 资源蜜蜂模组适合那些喜欢种植一切的人，但也喜欢看到他们的“农场”四处移动并发出嗡嗡声。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.projectE: 一切都是有代价的，等价交换使用的是EMC。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.AE2: 作为一种存储和物流模组，问AE2不能做什么比问它能做什么更容易。从存储到自动合成，它都可以做到！
atm9.quest.start3.desc.create: 机械动力是一个基于旋转力的科技模组。轴在移动，风车在移动，甚至连泵都在移动！
atm9.quest.start3.desc.ender: 末影接口模组是一个基于生物和合金的物流模组。 对于了解刷怪机制的人来说非常有用
atm9.quest.start3.desc.IF: 工业先锋模组是一个机器模组。开始时我们需要使用橡胶，但最后你将使用的不仅仅是橡胶。 准备好制造大量机器，不要忽视镭射钻！
atm9.quest.start3.desc.meka: 通用机械模组是另一个机器模组，但它更专注于多方块结构和生产大量电力。准备好建造裂变和聚变反应堆等。 通用机械的任务线有2章，你可能需要仔细查看
atm9.quest.start3.desc.rf: RFTools与其说是一个模组，不如说是一个系列。从采石场到 xnet，很多模组都属于它。 显然，采石场在这里并不重要，但你明白了！
atm9.quest.start3.desc.thermal: 热力系列模组是另一个机器模组，但它仅用于一些合金锭。抱歉，Thermal。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.focus: 召唤之核心是通过附魔装置获得的. 你需要击败荒野奇美拉获得荒野贡物。要知道如何召唤荒野奇美拉，请查看任务！
atm9.quest.start3.desc.gaia: 盖亚之魂击败盖亚获得。你需要通过盖亚仪式召唤盖亚并打败他. 查看任务来学习更多！
atm9.quest.start3.desc.rune: 你需要制作一些促速符文。要做到这一点，你需要 4个桶、2个金锭、一个气血宝珠、恶魔石板和一个速度符文。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.deorum: 神圣锭可以被合成, 你需要一些基础的原版物品和神秘水晶粉末、洁净粉末来合成它。你需要9个锭来合成一个块！
atm9.quest.start3.desc.heat: 热量核心是第四级注入物品。 使用力量工艺进行注入涉及几件事：1.液态力量2.电力3.被注入的物品与要注入的物品。你还需要确定注入等级，即升级册。升级册从每次注入中获得力量点数，并从中获得等级提升。所以，达到第4级并注入热量核心！
atm9.quest.start3.desc.soulgem: 通过灵魂宝石的仪式，你可以制作火箭。不，明明是要制作灵魂宝石。使用一些原版物品和一本绑定之书：巨灵
atm9.quest.start3.desc.witherless: 不凋玫瑰是一个护身符，可以让你免疫凋零效果。它由骷髅、苦力怕、黏液珍珠以及一些下界之星组成。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.capacitor: HDPC（高密度能量电容）是你可以从高级发电机模组获得的最好的物品。它可以用来合成ATM之星。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.nether: Generator'g Galore添加了许多发电机， 但是只有一个是最好的。 没错，它就是下界之星发电机，你或许需要两个！
atm9.quest.start3.desc.endergen: 不是最好的，但仍然是一个非常酷的发电机！
atm9.quest.start3.desc.prediction: 预测产物是模拟室中获得的。它们可以在战利品制造箱中使用，以获得你选择的战利品。你需要一个凋零预测产物来制作凋零指南针。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.seeds: 你需要最高级的种子来合成维度种子。 确切地说是盖亚之魂、下界之星、龙蛋和下界水晶！
atm9.quest.start3.desc.awakened: 神秘农业不仅仅有种子，也有许多实用物品。究极精华是最高等级的普通精华，可以与煤炭结合并制成究极精华煤炭。使用觉醒仪式可以升至觉醒精华。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.player: 玩家供电仪通电后，将为玩家附近的任何物品供电。你需要最高等级的玩家供电仪才能制作ATM之星。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.nitro: 下界等级是Powah模组的最高等级。它非常昂贵。为一个下界之星、两个红石块和一块烈焰晶体块注入20MFe，你可以获得下界水晶。 电池（下界）是你能获得的最好的手持能源
atm9.quest.start3.desc.dragonegg: 沉息的龙蛋是由龙碎块合成，龙碎块是由龙尘合成，龙族尘埃是由末影龙蜂蜜蜜脾离心而来。要获得末影龙蜂蜜蜜脾，你需要末影龙蜜蜂，你需要在末地的黑曜石蜂巢上使用龙息。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.omega: 这基本上是煤炭的4次方的很多倍。这基本上是煤炭的4次方很多倍。你需要贤者之石、一堆煤、一堆钻石。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.ring: 终极戒指！你需要5个红物质和等价交换模组的4个其他特定戒指：零度戒指、烈焰戒指、丰收女神戒指和疾风戒指。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.gale: 暗物质和羽毛组成了一个很棒的戒指！
atm9.quest.start3.desc.dark: 暗物质需要用永恒燃料块作为催化剂，用下界合金碎片、陨钢锭、末影锭和ATM锭在召唤祭坛制作。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.aeternalis: 永恒燃料块由9个永恒燃料合成而来，永恒燃料由4个莫比乌斯燃料合成，莫比乌斯燃料由4个炼金煤炭合成，炼金煤炭由4个煤炭合成。确切地说一共需要2304个煤炭！
atm9.quest.start3.desc.ingots: 这些热力合金可以通过两种方式制作。粉碎或感应炉。你可以用锤子得到所有物品的粉末，混合后再熔炼。或者直接在感应炉中制造合金。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.wireless: Xnet是一个很棒的物流模块！但我们需要Wifi，我的意思是路由器。制作它！
atm9.quest.start3.desc.flight: 模块将用于环境控制器中，为你提供创造飞行，但我们现在只想要ATM之星。没有飞行，只有星星！
atm9.quest.start3.desc.gravitational: 这将与MekaSuit装备一起用于飞行，但我们更想要ATM之星。它需要反物质靶丸、原子合金、下界之星和终极输导供应器。后者可以与输导矩阵一起使用，可以容纳超多能量，但你知道我们想要什么。它是用以前的精英输导供应器、终极能量立方和终极控制电路制作的。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.antimatter: 基本上是通用机械模组的最终产物。首先，你需要由裂变反应堆制成的钋。然后钋在超临界移相器中变成气体形式的反物质。然后输入化学结晶器得到反物质靶丸。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.builder: 工业先锋有很多机器，但我们想要凋零生成器。它通常用于得到以太气体，但我们要用它来制造ATM之星。它需要一个超级机器框架，有趣的是它需要以太气体。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.bank: 振动电容库是末影接口模组最大的存储设备，用于...我真的不知道数量是多少。但它需要很多的电容。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.sentient: 意识末影谐振器是末影接口模组农场部分的最终目标。不是像小麦一样耕种，是像灵魂一样耕种。
atm9.quest.start3.desc.arm: 再说一遍，这次我们没有使用机械动力来合成ATM之星。不过，我们确实需要机械臂来制作它的一个零件！我们需要摆放一些机械动力的机器来制作它
atm9.quest.start3.desc.storage: AE2用于存储，最高（非无限）存储是256M。 M代表Million， 大概是256,000,000。 它可以用来扩大存储空间，或者用来制作ATM之星！
atm9.quest.start3.desc.terminal: 为了使ATM之星获得创造宇宙的力量，它需要到达整个宇宙。 通用终端和奇点应该会有所帮助！终端可以从其他终端中制作，但奇点不同。 使用物质聚合器，你可以放置存储组件，希望它是一个奇点。不过，存储组件可能需要已满...
atm9.quest.start3.desc.singularity: 制作一个无限小的物品
atm9.quest.affixes.desc.gems: 如果你想要好的装备，你将需要神化词缀，而这一切都始于一颗宝石。
atm9.quest.affixes.desc.dust: 要获得宝石粉末，你需要一颗神化宝石和一个铁砧。任何神化宝石（仅推荐普通和罕见）。一旦你得到了宝石，用掉落的铁砧砸碎它们！然后，为了简化此操作，请制作一个回收台。
atm9.quest.affixes.desc.smith: 你已经有工具和宝石，那么我们如何将它们结合起来呢？首先，确保你的工具有一个镶孔槽位。（有关槽位的更多信息，请查看药剂和符文部分）。如果有一个是镶孔，你可以将你的工具和宝石在锻造台上进行组合。如果你对当前的宝石不满意，那么你可能需要一个...
atm9.quest.affixes.desc.gem_cutting: 宝石切割台！要更改宝石的稀有度，你需要使用它。通过使用2种相同的宝石和材料，你可以增加宝石的稀有度。
atm9.quest.affixes.desc.flawless: 宝石越好，属性就越高！无瑕是第二好的，而完美是最好的
atm9.quest.affixes.desc.affix: 词缀武器可以通过许多方法获得，但我如何知道哪些是词缀武器？词缀武器的名称通常都很长，通常包含武器类型和之前可能拥有它的人的名字。它也会被染上它的稀有度颜色，绿色表示普通，蓝色表示稀有等等。它也会有额外的属性或至少增加附魔的可能性。
atm9.quest.affixes.desc.mythic: 神话词缀是你可以获得的最佳词缀，因此神话武器就是你的奋斗目标。祝你好运！
atm9.quest.affixes.desc.vials_and_sigils: 药剂和符文用于更改武器的开孔插槽，无论是添加更多插槽还是释放它们。
atm9.quest.affixes.desc.sigil: 对于那些刚接触神化的人来说，开孔比较令人困惑。你的武器和装备需要开孔才能使用宝石。但是，如果它没有开孔怎么办？那么你就需要一个镶孔符石！
atm9.quest.affixes.desc.superior_sigil: 高级镶孔符石的功能与其低级版本完全相同，但最多可以开四个孔而不是3个。
atm9.quest.affixes.desc.vialU: 除名药剂正如它所暗示的那样。当你有一个名字比较难听的物品时，你可以把它与锻造台上的除名药剂结合起来，以去掉大部分的名字。（只有与稀有度颜色相同的材料和武器类型会保留）。
atm9.quest.affixes.desc.vialA: 奥术提取剂的作用与灼热驱逐剂相反，它不是毁坏宝石，而是毁坏物品，你可以保留宝石。
atm9.quest.affixes.desc.vialS: 灼热驱逐剂可用于锻造台，以从物品的孔位中取出宝石。警告：这将破坏宝石并释放一个孔位
atm9.quest.affixes.desc.salvaging_table: 回收台终于可以在不使用铁砧的情况下为你获取材料和宝石粉。你可以回收带有词缀的工具和装备来获取它们的材料。
atm9.quest.affixes.desc.simple: 简易重铸台的使用方式类似于附魔台，但带有词缀。使用宝石粉、稀有材料和固定物品，你可以花费经验更改词缀。
atm9.quest.affixes.desc.reforge: 重铸台可以做简易重铸台做的所有事情，但更好的是，它可以打造史诗和神话词缀！
atm9.quest.SG.SG: 寂静宝石 装备和工具
atm9.quest.SG.tier1SGC: 一级星光充能仪催化剂
atm9.quest.SG.tier2SGC: 二级星光充能仪催化剂
atm9.quest.SG.tier3SGC: 三级星光充能仪催化剂
atm9.quest.SG.desc.SG:
寂静宝石模组是一个工具和装备模组，使制作装备变得容易。 
 
每个装备都是可定制的，让你可以使用特殊特性升级它或在旅途中修理它！
 
你还可以将铁镐等原版工具放入工作台中，将其转换为本模组的工具！
atm9.quest.SG.desc.template:
要开始在游戏早期制作装备，我们需要制作一些 &9模具基板&r来制作我们的第一个&e模具&r。
 
模板是用于创建工具部件的一次性“蓝图”。使用模具基板，为自己制作一个&a镐模具&r。
 
如果将镐模板与3个常见材料结合使用，则可以创建镐头零件。
 
*注意：材料必须有寂静装备材料的提示
atm9.quest.SG.desc.SGTool:
要制作你的第一个工具，请拿起你的镐头部分并将其放入工作台中。
 
要合成一个完整的镐，你可以在工作台上添加一个木棍，或使用 &9工具手柄模具&r创建自己的自定义手柄，而不是使用木棍。
 
 *注意：你可以随时搜索模板，然后按 U，然后导航到“装备打造”选项卡。这将向你展示如何制作装备零件。
atm9.quest.SG.desc.blueprint: 你不能永远使用模具!! \n \n空白蓝图用于制作蓝图，与模具不同，蓝图是可重复使用的。
atm9.quest.SG.desc.tip: 顶端升级用于提高工具的挖掘水平。\n \n例如：如果你有一把挖掘钻石的铁镐，你可以进行钻石尖端升级，并将其放在你的镐上。这将使它能够开采黑曜石，并为其提供属性提升。
atm9.quest.SG.desc.coating: 涂覆物品或工具。\n \n 下界合金是一种很好的涂层材料。
atm9.quest.SG.desc.sword: 每个人都喜欢剑。\n \n 有了这个蓝图，你就可以制作出基本的剑了！不俗的伤害，不俗的速度。
atm9.quest.SG.desc.dagger: 伤害低，攻击速度非常快。减少目标的无敌时间。
atm9.quest.SG.desc.machete: 比剑的伤害更高，但速度更慢。
atm9.quest.SG.desc.spear: 伤害比剑小，但范围更远。
atm9.quest.SG.desc.knife: 比匕首具有更高的耐久度，但伤害和速度较低。
atm9.quest.SG.desc.repairkit:
寂静宝石的物品可以使用 &9修复套件&r进行维修。
 
要修复物品，请将修复套件放入工作台中，然后将修复工具所需的材料一起放入工作台内。这将“填充”修复套件。
 
要修复该工具，请将填充满的修复套件与你想要修复的工具在工作台中结合在一起
atm9.quest.SG.desc.material_grader:
将锭与分级催化剂一起放入其中将使材料获得等级。
 
等级越高，材料就越好。 
 
最高的等级是MAX.
atm9.quest.SG.desc.alloyer: 这用于制作合金。\n \n这也是获得提尔钢锭的唯一途径！
atm9.quest.SG.desc.starlight_charger:
星光充能仪可以使用“星光”对材料进行“附魔”。
 
必须建造一个结构，将星光充电器放在中间，以仰望夜空。它只在夜间获得星光之力。
 
充能仪必须放置在7x7结构的中间，每个角落都有一个支柱。每个柱子都必须有一个“星光充能仪柱顶”。
 
它还要求每种材料都有一个充能仪催化剂。
atm9.quest.SG.desc.tier1SGCPC: 这是用于星光充能仪结构的一级柱顶。
atm9.quest.SG.desc.tier2SGCPC: 这是用于星光充能仪结构的二级柱顶。
atm9.quest.SG.desc.tier3SGCPC: 这是用于星光充能仪结构的三级柱顶。
atm9.quest.SG.subt.tip: 当你没有找到 3 颗钻石时。
atm9.quest.SG.subt.binding: 它将所有东西结合在一起。
atm9.quest.SG.subt.spear: 释放你内心的斯巴达人
atm9.quest.mahou.desc.start: Welcome to Mahou Tsukai. No, you can't instantly get the Morgan sword you'll need to actually play the mod a little. To start take some damage. You'll have a bleeding effect. before it fades, hold shift and press M on a solid block to place your first mahou circle.
atm9.quest.mahou.desc.mana: Mahou is the life source of everything Mahou Tsukai. You'll need to increase it and have tons to use spells and make weapons. When you use Mahou your limit goes up. An easy way of spending Mahou is using Attuned Emerald or Diamond to store more Mahou. Once you have a high enough Mahou you can try these spells...
atm9.quest.mahou.desc.mortar: In order to get spells you'll need powdered items. To get powdered items you'll need a Mortar and Pestle.
atm9.quest.mahou.desc.scrolls: Some spells can be put into scrolls to be used wherever needed. First, you'll need a Spell Cloth and place it down. Then, do the same ritual but onto the spell cloth. Once all the blood and powder is done right click the Spell Cloth and Boom Scroll! Some can not be turned into Scrolls so I am not held liable to wasted materials for that.
atm9.quest.mahou.desc.life: Once you've got at least two hundred mahou you might want to make a boundary of drain life. For every mob that dies in that boundary, you get 10 mahou back, but this is a SLOW process.
atm9.quest.mahou.desc.durability: Or, make a durability exchange and toss strong (but not too strong, no chisels because the mod normalizes things to around a netherite shovel in terms of durability)
atm9.quest.mahou.desc.chronal: Another option is using Chronal exchange; gain mahou for 12 hours, then spend it for 12 hours. If you make a second Chronal exchange circle when the first starts spending, it becomes a loop.
atm9.quest.mahou.desc.morgan: I know why you all are here for, you're here for the Morgan sword. The most powerful sword of all the ATM Modpacks. Follow these and you'll become unstoppable.
atm9.quest.mahou.desc.emerald: Attuned Diamond/emeralds are mahou batteries and you'll need lots of Mahou for getting Morgan. A full attuned emerald can be used for the 5000 mahou Caliburn ritual.
atm9.quest.mahou.desc.power: In order to get Morgan you need Caliburn. In order to get Caliburn you need the Mahou Lake. In order to get the Mahou Lake you'll need the Power Consolidation Ritual. Which can be done like any other ritual just with 2 powdered diamonds and 1 powdered emerald. FYI don't do it near your base, the ritual will be the middle of the Lake.
atm9.quest.mahou.desc.lake: Once the ritual has started you will notice the Lake being made. It will grow to about a 20x20 block area full of murky water. The Murky Water will not kill you unless you forget to go for air.
atm9.quest.mahou.desc.caliburn: Caliburn requires a few things, some already stated in quests some not yet. First, you need the Mahou Lake and 5000 Mahou. Then, you'll need an enchanted Diamond Sword with Smite. (The higher the better). Throw the sword into the lake and you'll find Caliburn at the bottom of it.
atm9.quest.mahou.desc.upgrading: Caliburn will start off not much better than a Diamond Sword but once upgraded the Diamond Sword looks more like a normal stick. Both Morgan and Caliburn have their actual damage and their innate cap. Innate Cap is max damage it can be increased to. To increase the Innate Cap of Caliburn, enchant it with Smite then toss it in the lake with Ender Upgrades. To get the Max Cap you need 26 Ender Upgrades. Once upgraded it can't be upgraded anymore so make sure you toss in all 26 at once. To increase the normal damage you'll need to enchant it with Smite then back in the Lake it goes! You'll need more damage in order to...
atm9.quest.mahou.desc.warden: To get Morgan you need to kill the Warden with Caliburn. Also Caliburns Innate Cap will be Morgans Innate Cap. Good luck!
atm9.quest.mahou.desc.genocide: The only way to increase Morgan's damage is by killing villagers. Baby Villagers give even more damage! Hopefully you have a farm set up. Then after many many many villager deaths you'll have a maxed out Morgan. Also you can hold right click with Morgan to do a special attack.
atm9.quest.mahou.desc.strength: In order to get more fun little Mahou Tsukai weapons, you'll need a Scroll of Strengthening. To get one, place down a Spell Cloth, then do the ritual of strengthening on top of it and pick up the cloth.
atm9.quest.mahou.desc.stick: Hold a stick in your off hand and the Scroll of Strengthening in your main and hold right click.
atm9.quest.mahou.desc.emrys: I wonder what you need to do to get a Lightning Staff? Could it be getting struck by lightning while holding the Strengthened Stick? I think so! Once you have Emrys hold it in your off hand and hold right click, the results will be SHOCKING!
atm9.quest.mahou.desc.sword: Hold a Diamond Sword in your off hand and the Scroll of Strengthening in your main and hold right click.
atm9.quest.mahou.desc.clarent: Take your Strengthened Diamond Sword in a pool of Dragon's Breath and you will get Clarent! Clarent works as a shield and sword. Hold right click to block with Clarent and any attacks it blocks it'll deal the same damage it blocked.
atm9.quest.mahou.desc.shield: Hold a Shield in your off hand and the Scroll of Strengthening in your main and hold right click.
atm9.quest.mahou.desc.souls: The last thing you need for Replica, obviously involves another Scroll. Scroll of the Mystic Eyes of Death Collection. It will allow you to collect Souls from watchings mobs die. Each death is only a very little bit of souls so you'll need to see a lot of death. Once you have 100 you're ready to get Replica.
atm9.quest.mahou.desc.damage: One Scroll you'll need applied to get Replica is the Scroll of Damage Exchange. To get it do the Ritual of Damage Exchange with 1 Powdered Iron and 2 Powdered Emeralds.
atm9.quest.mahou.desc.immunity: The Second Scroll you need activated to get Replica is the Scroll of Immunity Exchange. To get it you'll need the Ritual of Immunity Exchange which needs 1 Powdered Eye and 2 Powdered Emeralds.
atm9.quest.mahou.desc.replica: Now this ones complicated. To get Replica first have 100 souls, Damage Exchange, and Immunity Exchange ready. Then, hold your strengthened shield to block an attack, then you'll have Replica.
atm9.quest.storage.desc.basic: 欢迎来到基础存储章节！ \n \n你将在这里找到在没有电力的情况下存储物品的基本方式，以及满足你其他需求的存储方式
atm9.quest.storage.desc.trash: 一种销毁物品、液体、能量方法。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.NBT:
想要使用 &9精致存储&r或&9应用能源2&r创建虚拟存储？
 
这些都是升级存储的好方法，但重要的是要谈论 &eNBT物品&r 以及存储它们的最佳方式。
 
NBT物品是附加了额外标签的物品。附魔物品、耐久物品、神化宝石......这些都是附有NBT标签的物品。因此，它们通常不会堆叠。
 
当你将大量此类物品存储到像RS或AE2这样的存储系统中时，你的服务器或存档可能会出现问题。
 
因此，最好将它们存放在箱子或背包中！
atm9.quest.storage.desc.ender:
跨维度工作的箱子。
 
 可以进行颜色编码以确保安全！（右键单击来染色）。
 
*注意：如果其他人使用你的颜色组合，他们也可以访问你的箱子！
atm9.quest.storage.desc.functional: 功能性存储是一种用于存储相同物品的模组。\n \n这对于圆石、泥土等物品很有用。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.drawer: 制作一个1x1的抽屉。这个抽屉可以容纳许多物品（单一）
atm9.quest.storage.desc.link:
用于将抽屉链接到控制器，也用于链接末影抽屉。
 
要将抽屉链接到存储控制器，请右键单击存储控制器以开始配置。右键单击抽屉会将它们添加到网络中。
 
手拿该工具会显示哪些抽屉连接到了存储控制器。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.configurator: 配置工具用于锁定抽屉，以便记住抽屉里面的物品。\n \n每当从抽屉里拿出或放置物品时，这都很有用。锁定的抽屉不会替换锁定在其上的物品！
atm9.quest.storage.desc.enderdrawer:
使用 &a链接工具&r，你可以链接2个末影抽屉以同步物品。
 
这就像末影箱一样工作。
 
要链接，请使用 &a链接工具&r右键单击第一个末影抽屉，然后左键单击要同步的第二个末影抽屉。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.f_controller: 当放置并使用&a链接工具&r连接到其他抽屉时，该方块充当“中心”。 \n \n如果你右键双击存储控制器，那你的物品栏中的所有在存储抽屉网络中的物品都将被存入抽屉中。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.simple_compactin: 此抽屉将自动将放置在里面的物品转换为其压缩形式。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.adv_compacting: 此抽屉可以将放置在其中的物品转换为其压缩形式\n \n例如：放入其中的铁锭可以让你取出9个铁粒，或者如果放入更多铁，则会自动压缩为铁块。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.framed: 想要定制抽屉吗？不用再看了，这些抽屉可以让你定制外层和内层的纹理。\n \n按照工具提示进行操作。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.fluid_drawers: 如果你认为这个模组只存储物品，那你就错了，还有流体抽屉。\n它们的工作方式与普通抽屉相同，但储存的是液体。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.f_upgrades: 除了存储升级外，还有其他有用的升级。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.acess_point: 当链接到存储控制器时，充当存储控制器，功能基本上和存储控制器一样。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.puller: 这种升级允许抽屉从任何一侧存入物品。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.pusher: 这种升级允许抽屉从任何一侧提取物品。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.f_void: 此升级将使抽屉已满时销毁额外物品。这对于防止物品溢出非常有用。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.downgrade: 此升级会将抽屉最大空间降级。这对于保持库存物品很有用，但不能太多。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.redstone:
这次升级将使抽屉在四面八方输出红石信号，信号强度表示它有多满/多空。
对于多插槽抽屉，可以配置升级到要监控的插槽。
 
0 - 表示空 
15 - 表示满。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.collector: 此升级将使抽屉从一侧吸入物品。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.sophisticated: 精妙存储的箱子允许你用金属升级你的宝箱，以增加存储空间！你还可以添加升级以增加箱子的功能。\n \n不再有原版两个箱子拼接！
atm9.quest.storage.desc.chest: 就像原版箱子一样，但有一个用于存储升级的插槽！
atm9.quest.storage.desc.iron: *注意：要将已经放置的原版箱子升级为铁箱子，你首先需要使用“基础升级”来转换箱子。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.netherite: 有更多插槽用于存储和升级。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.upgrade: 为了避免整个任务被升级所覆盖，请查看精妙背包升级。\n \n 你需要制造背包升级，但它们功能基本相同。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.backpack: 精妙背包提供可升级的背包，还可以使用升级来添加有用的功能！
atm9.quest.storage.desc.upgrade_base: 你将需要这些来进行背包升级。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.s_controller:
存储控制器允许将多个存储设备作为一个大型存储多方块结构来操作
 
这允许一个非常大的存储网络，可以与AE2、RS或动态联合等模组结合使用，因为存储控制器可以充当连接到它的所有存储的输入/输出点。
 
只需将存储设备放在存储控制器旁边或已连接到存储控制器的其他设备旁边即可完成连接（在各个方向上距离存储控制器最多14个方块）
atm9.quest.storage.desc.storage_tool: 存储控制器还能够无线连接到其他存储，这可以使用存储工具，只需右键单击控制器进行绑定，然后右键单击存储以链接它们。\n \n无线链接的范围与常规相同，为14个方块。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.storage_link:
存储链接允许你连接未连接到控制器的多个存储或连接到控制器的任何方块。
 
因此，这是一种无线连接“多方块”存储的方法，而无需右键单击每个存储。
 
14个方块的范围仍然适用。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.rftools: RFTools 是一个强大的模组，在许多不同的类别中拥有大量有用的机器/方块。存储就是其中之一。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.scanner:
存储检测器是一个非常强大的早期游戏存储“系统”，它使用能量来无线读取和访问多达20个方块的区域内的存储。

它允许你通过它存储物品，并使用所有库存中的物品进行制作。


  &o注意和建议：&r 它不能很好地处理大箱子（它将它们读取为2个不同的箱子，显示2倍重复的物品）
atm9.quest.storage.desc.modular:
模块化存储是 RFTools 中的主要存储组件，它以数字形式存储物品，顾名思义，你可以让多个物品作为一个整体工作。 

它能存储多少取决于你拥有的存储模块的等级。\n\n数字系统对垃圾和NBT物品更敏感。那是什么？请在本章中间查找“NBT与你“任务。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.filter: 过滤器模块有很多用途，其中之一是限制哪些物品可以进入模块化存储，无论是由你放入，还是通过外部来源，如漏斗或管道。
atm9.quest.storage.desc.module1:
存储模块是模块化存储的磁盘，每一层都有不同数量的空间可以容纳在里面。

这个是第一个，有100个空间容量。请记住，这可以是100堆石头，也可以是100个盔甲/工具，因为它们不会堆叠，所以在将垃圾放入你的系统中时要小心。
atm9.quest.storage.subt.PU: 增加了从储罐升级中泵送液体的能力。
atm9.quest.storage.subt.stack1: 增加背包中的堆叠大小。
atm9.quest.storage.subt.tank: 在背包中添加一个储罐。
atm9.quest.storage.subt.stonecutting: 将切石机的GUI 添加到背包中。
atm9.quest.storage.subt.refill: 从背包中提取物品填充到物品栏
atm9.quest.storage.subt.inception: 我听说你喜欢背包里的背包。
atm9.quest.storage.subt.crafting: 将工作台的GUI添加到背包中。
atm9.quest.storage.subt.filter: 添加一个过滤器，用于将物品放入或移出背包。
atm9.quest.storage.subt.magnet: 吸收将物品放入背包中。
atm9.quest.storage.subt.bpcompacting: 将背包中的物品压缩到他们的2x2配方中。
atm9.quest.storage.subt.Acompacting: 将背包中的物品压缩到他们的3x3配方中。
atm9.quest.storage.subt.smoking: 将烟熏炉的GUI 添加到背包中。
atm9.quest.storage.subt.blasting: 将高炉的GUI 添加到背包中。
atm9.quest.storage.subt.smelting: 在背包中添加了一个熔炼页面
atm9.quest.storage.subt.tool: 自动切换到对你正在指向的方块最有效的工具。
atm9.quest.storage.subt.void: 为要在背包中自动删除的物品添加过滤器。
atm9.quest.storage.subt.Asmelting: 自动在背包中熔炼物品。
atm9.quest.storage.subt.scanner: 无需再四处奔波寻找物品。
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.AE2:
&lWelcome to &bApplied Energistics 2&f! 
 
 Applied Energistics 2 (or &oAE2&r for short) is an incredibly versatile &bdigital storage&f mod, allowing for extremely efficient storage and all sorts of automation capabilities to greatly augment your modded Minecraft experience from as early as you want to the very endgame. 
 
 To get started with AE2, you will need to sieve for an important resource for the mod known as &bCertus Quartz&f. 
 
 For more information on AE2 beyond this chapter, consult the wiki over at
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.wrench: The &bQuartz Wrench&f does what any regular tech mod wrench would do. It rotates blocks and devices along the face you right-click on and dismantles them when right-clicked while sneaking. \n \n AE2's wrench comes in both certus and nether quartz flavours.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.first:
Two of the very first things you will need to get started in AE2 are the &bCharger&f and the &bInscriber&f. 
 
 The &bCharger&f, when supplied with power, will take &eCertus Quartz Crystals&r and charge them. These &eCharged Certus Crystals&r can then be used in the production of &eFluix&f, another important resource in the mod. It can also be used to charge any item that stores power. 
 
 The &bInscriber&f can be used to turn the various quartz crystals in AE2 into their dust form, but more importantly is used to fabricate special &ePrinted Circuits&f and &eProcessors&f, as will become clearer in the next quest.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.energy_acceptor: While the Inscriber and Charger will natively accept RF/FE, the vast majority of an ME network uses its own dedicated power system called AE. \n \n RF/FE can be converted into the native AE at a ratio of 2:1 RF:AE, either directly through an ME Controller, or through the &bEnergy Acceptor&f, which can instead be connected to any part of the network.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.energy_cell: By default, an ME network on its own only has an internal buffer of 800AE without an ME Controller, with the controller adding an extra 8kAE per block. For large enough networks, this can be insufficient and may cause a network to power off intermittently when trying to recoup power for any connected devices. \n \n The &bEnergy Cell&f allows for an ME network to hold significantly more energy, adding another 200kAE per regular Energy Cell and 1.6MAE per &bDense&f Energy Cell. These can also be placed anywhere in the network to provide the increased energy buffer.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.energy_card: The &bEnergy Card&f can be applied to most chargeable devices like Portable Cells and Wireless Terminals (covered later) to also increase &otheir&r energy buffer.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.meteorite:
Since we're missing the floor, finding where meteorites land is gonna be a little too hard so instead we've replaced them! 

 Instead of finding Inscriber Press you can now craft them with an Inscriber. You'll need skystone dust for crafting them which we can get from sieving Dust. 

 Don't worry they are still used the same as if ATM9 had floor.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.processors: Once you have obtained a full set of the required &eInscriber Presses&r, it's time to start making some &eProcessors&f. These are an important crafting ingredient used to make the large majority of ME-connected devices.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.terminals: &eTerminals&f provide access to any of the contents of an ME network. The standard &eME Terminal&f simply lists everything in the network as one large grid to pull from and insert into, akin to a single inventory. \n \n The &eME Crafting Terminal&f is an extension of the ME Terminal which also provides a built-in crafting grid, allowing for convenient crafting using any item contained in the network and visible through the terminal screen.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.network: The &bNetwork Tool&f is an important tool throughout AE2, which is used to display various details of a network on-screen such as overall power consumption and storage. \n \n As an added bonus, it also provides its own small inventory used to hold &eupgrade cards&f, which can be accessed when looking at any upgradeable device's screen for easy replacement. However, it cannot rotate blocks attached to the ME network like a regular wrench, only dismantle them when sneaking.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.fluix: Arguably the most important resource you will need next is &eFluix&f, used throughout the vast majority of AE2 devices and serving as a base for crafting all of the cabling within an ME network. \n \n You'll typically want to mass produce these, and the way to do so is to make a &bFluix Crystal&f by throwing &eNether Quartz&f, &e&oCharged&r&e Certus quartz&r and &eRedstone&f together in a pool of water. This will give you a &eFluix Crystal&r which you can turn to dust in an Inscriber.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.cables:
To connect the vast majority of your ME network together, you will need some cable. &eME Glass Cable&f is the first and most basic kind of cable, and you'll be making this all throughout as the first step towards crafting the other kinds of cable. 
 
 Both glass cables and their &ecovered&f counterpart can carry up to 8 channels along a single section of cabling. Unlike glass cables, covered cables can subsequently be crafted into &edense&f covered cables, capable of carrying up to 32 channels. However, most 'multipart' devices such as buses and terminals cannot be directly attached to dense cables, requiring normal-width cables to form a connection instead. 
 
 All cables can also be crafted with dye to colour them. Uncoloured ('Fluix') cables can connect to any other colour of cable, but otherwise differently-coloured cables will never connect to one another.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.anchor:
The &bQuartz Cutting Knife&f, like the wrench, comes in both nether and certus quartz flavours and is a useful crafting tool to have on hand. 
 
 Cables can also be separated without needing to be coloured by attaching a &bCable Anchor&f between them, crafted using this knife and craftable up to 50 times with the same knife before it breaks. 
 
 Cable Anchors can also be used to craft &bCable Facades&f, allowing you to disguise cables within walls by covering them with the face of an arbitrary block. While facade recipes are hidden in JEI, you can still craft them by taking any regular block and surrounding it with 4 cable anchors in the crafting grid. 
 
 Aside from crafting anchors, the cutting knife also has another use: right-clicking with the knife will open a small GUI that allows you to craft &bInscriber Name Presses&f. When given a name, these presses can be used inside of an Inscriber to rename any input item with the name of the press. Two of these presses can be concatenated in the inscriber to rename the item to the name of the top press, followed by the bottom one.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.advanced_cabling: The &bME Smart Cable&f and &bDense Smart Cable&f function identically to the covered cables in terms of channel distribution, but will also visibly display the amount of channels they are using as coloured lines along themselves.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.coloring: The &bColor Applicator&f is a chargeable tool that allows for in-world dyeing of cables. It functions more or less as a specialised &estorage cell&f to be loaded up with either vanilla dyes or &epaint balls&f for specific colours, along with &esnowballs&f to wash colours off and turn cables back to their Fluix variant. \n \n Applying colour to a cable uses 100AE of energy from its internal battery, for a total of 3400 cable segments in a single charge.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.channels:
In Applied Energistics 2, every ME network has a certain number of &echannels&f available, which simply means how many networked devices can fit on the whole network. 
 
 As a rule of thumb, any device that more or less handles ME data directly (items stored within the network) and carries out some form of I/O will take up a channel. Usually components that are only concerned with the internal power storage of the network, like &eEnergy Cells&f and &eInscribers&f, do &onot&r take up channels. 
 
 Networks without an &bME Controller&f are known as 'ad-hoc' networks and only support a maximum of 8 channels.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.ME_controller:
The last piece of the puzzle for any large ME network is the &bME Controller&f. 
 
 A controller supplies an ME Network with a far larger number of channels than the standard 8 channels for ad-hoc networks, providing 32 channels out of each face of the block for a total of 216 channels. 
 
 That's only for a single-block controller, however, since the ME Controller is in fact a multi-block structure. The controller can be up to 7x7x7 blocks in size and can come in any freeform arrangement within that maximum size. Each individual block can then provide its own separate set of channels, so long as no single controller block is surrounded by 4 other blocks along the same plane. 
 
 An ME Network may only contain one multiblock controller at any given time. Attempting to connect more than one controller on separate parts of the network will cause a conflict, shutting down the whole network.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.storage:
Arguably the most important aspect of Applied Energistics 2 is its storage system, making use of digital &eStorage Cells&f. These cells are accessible through either an &eME Chest&r for single cells, or an &eME Drive&r for multiple cells. 
 
 The &bME Chest&f holds a single Cell at a time, which can then be read from and written to from any other terminal on the same network. The ME Chest itself also provides its own terminal screen on the top with specific access only to the cell it contains. 
 
 The &bME Drive&f can hold up to 10 assorted Storage Cells in the space of a single block and a single ME channel. However, it does not provide its own terminal screen, requiring some external terminal elsewhere on the network for storage access.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.MEIOPort: The &bME IO Port&f allows for the contents of an ME network's storage to be quickly rearranged between different storage media such as ME cells and external containers connected to storage buses. \n \n When a cell is inserted in an input slot on the left, the IO Port can be toggled to either empty the cell out into other ME storages or fill the (ideally, partitioned) cell with certain items spread out across other storages.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.workbench: The &bCell Workbench&f allows for cells to be 'partitioned' to hold specific items, i.e. given a whitelist filter. It also allows the cell to be upgraded with certain upgrade cards such as the Inverter Card, which sets the aforementioned whitelist to be a blacklist instead. \n \n Cells can also be given a higher or lower 'priority' via the workbench, i.e. allow the cell to be the first to receive certain items until full, or made to wait for other higher-priority cells to fill up first.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.equal_card: The &bEqual Distribution Card&f is an upgrade for storage cells that pre-allocates a certain amount of items that can be taken up by any individual type. \n \n This behaviour is comparable to something like a Functional Storage drawer, wherein each compartment holds a set number of stacks as opposed to allowing items from one compartment to leak into the others and crowd other kinds of items out.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.overflow_card: This behaviour is comparable to something like a Functional Storage drawer, wherein each compartment holds a set number of stacks as opposed to allowing items from one compartment to leak into the others and crowd other kinds of items out.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.1k: Each individual cell has a certain capacity dictated by the &ecomponent&f that the cell has been crafted with. \n \n The first of the components is the &b1k ME Storage Component&f, providing &e1024&f 'bytes' of storage for a given cell. More on that later.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.4k: The second tier of storage component, providing &e4096&f bytes of storage.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.16k: The third tier of storage component, providing &e16384&f bytes of storage.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.64k: The fourth tier of storage component, providing &e65536&f bytes of storage.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.256k: The fifth and final AE2-standard tier of storage component, providing &e262144&f bytes of storage.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.1m: There comes a point in any playthrough of a large modpack where even the highest standard tier of storage cell doesn't cut it for the amount of items and resources that you may be accumulating. \n \n This is where the &dMEGA Cells&f add-on comes in, extending the available tiers of storage into the megabyte territory. The first of these new tiers is given by the &b1M MEGA Storage Component&f, providing 1024 &okilo&rbytes, or &e1048576&f bytes, of storage.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.4m: The second MEGA tier of storage component, providing &e4194304&f (4096k) bytes of storage.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.16m: The third MEGA tier of storage component, providing &e16777216&f (16384k) bytes of storage.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.64m: The fourth MEGA tier of storage component, providing &e67108864&f (65536k) bytes of storage.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.256: The fifth and final MEGA tier of storage component, providing &e268435456&f (262144k) bytes of storage.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.item_storage:
With the 1k Storage Component, you can now craft yourself a 1k ME Item Storage Cell to start your digital item storage system. You'll most likely want the majority of your storage to be for items, so you'll probably want to make a few &bME Item Storage Cells&f. 
 
 ME Item Storage Cells can each hold up to 63 different types of items. Each new type of item added to a cell will take up a certain fraction of the storage cell's total capacity in bytes. For each type already present, 1 'byte' counts for 8 items of that same type. 
 
 As an example, a 1k Item Storage Cell containing only cobblestone can hold up to 8128 cobblestone (8*1024b - 8b/type * 1 type). 
 
 If a cell is empty, it can be repurposed by disassembling it into its respective component and housing. This is done by sneaking and right-clicking in the air with the cell in your hand.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.more_items:
Aside from DISKs, you can also use netherite to craft what is effectively the complete opposite of the DISK. 
 
 &dMEGA Cells&f offers the bespoke &bBulk Item Storage Cell&f, which is limited to no more than &oone&r type of item storeable per cell but can store a practically &o&lINFINITE&r* number of that item type. Before it can accept an item type, it must be filtered in advance using a Cell Workbench. 
 
 *&oTechnically 'max long'. If you know then you know.&r
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.fluid:
Items are not the only things that can be stored in ME cells. &bME Fluid Storage Cells&f can store liquids such as water, lava and any variety of modded oils and fuels, just to give a few examples. 
 
 Note that all storage cells, regardless of what they're designed to store, only differ in terms of their housing; both item and fluid cells use the same kind of storage component to make. 
 
 For fluids, 1 byte equals 8 buckets (8000mb).
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.portable: &bPortable Cells&f function identically to regular cells in that they can be inserted into a chest or drive and filled accordingly. \n \n However, unlike regular cells, their contents can also be accessed standalone via the cell item itself, a bit like a digital ME-flavoured backpack.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.weapons:
These last three items are more or less some extra toys provided by AE2 and don't necessarily fit under any of these quest trees. 
 
 The &bCharged Staff&f is just a simple powered staff which deals 3 hearts of damage and consumes 300AE per hit. It also uses pre-1.9 combat mechanics, meaning that you can spam-click with this like in the good old days. 
 
 The &bEntropy Manipulator&f, when &oused&r on certain blocks in the world, will smelt them in-place, such as sand to glass and metal ores to metal ingots. If not, it will simply light a fire on the block. 
 
 Finally, the &bMatter Cannon&f functions similarly to the Color Applicator as a dedicated cell for holding 'ammo' items such as Matter Balls and iron/gold nuggets, which can then be fired out to deal damage to mobs or break blocks. Heavier 'ammo'Matter Balls in a Matter Cannon can be substituted with &bPaint Balls&f, which will apply a paint splatter effect on the face of whatever block being fired at. &bLumen Paint Balls&f are a variant of paint balls exclusively used by the Matter Cannon, whose paint splatters also give off some light once present in the world.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.autocrafting:
Storage is nice and all that, but what good is a storage system if it's clogged up with raw materials needing to be crafted and processed into something and you're still stuck with having to do so manually? 
 
 AE2's &eauto-crafting&f system begins with the &bME Pattern Provider&f. The Pattern Provider holds certain items called &bPatterns&f (covered in the next quest) which are programmed to hold some recipe that turns input items into a certain output. Up to 9 patterns can fit in one provider. 
 
 You'll often be making use of multiple pattern providers scattered all throughout your base, which is why it's useful to have a &bPattern Access Terminal&f to remotely access the contents of any and all providers on your wider ME network.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.growth: Naturally, AE2 provides its own way to dramatically speed up crystal growth. \n \n Place these around your Budding Crystals, give them some power, and watch your crystals grow!
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.patterns: &bPatterns&f are what hold an encoded recipe to be fulfilled by a Pattern Provider. To encode a recipe onto a Pattern, the &bME Pattern Encoding Terminal&f must be used. \n \n Patterns can be set to hold either a regular &ecrafting&f recipe, which will require the use of a &eMolecular Assembler&f on the face of its Provider, or a more general '&eprocessing&f' recipe, wherein any input items can be sent out by the provider into some other machine block or specialised processing plant.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.assembler:
The &bMolecular Assembler&f is AE2's equivalent of an automatic crafting table, required to fulfil any and all &ecrafting&f pattern jobs. 
 
 Molecular Assemblers are capable of transferring power and channels to other ME devices connected to it, but will not themselves take up a channel. Up to 6 MAs can be connected to a single Pattern Provider (if employed) to allow for more crafts to be done in parallel. 
 
 MAs also each have their own dedicated slot for a single crafting pattern, allowing them to function standalone when powered. When operated in this way, any matching items inserted into the MA will be automatically crafted into the result of the pattern.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.acceleration: The &bAcceleration Card&f, depending on the device being upgraded with it, will either increase the speed at which the device operates or allow the device to carry out more operations in one go. \n \n In the case of the &eMolecular Assembler&f, a full set of 5 cards reduces the time taken for the MA to fulfil a craft from one second (with no cards) to one &otick&r.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.MElevel: The &bME Level Emitter&f, when configured with a specific item and quantity of it to respond to, will emit a redstone signal depending on whether that item stored in the network either falls below, goes above or equals the given quantity. \n \n This can be used, for example, to automatically switch certain machines on with redstone to auto-craft a resource when it falls below a given minimum amount.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.redstoneME: Individual ME devices can also be configured to respond to redstone signals. When upgraded with a &bRedstone Card&f, a device can be configured to do work only when powered with redstone or otherwise as needed. \n \n This behavior can also apply to entire &osections&r of an ME network by using an &bME Toggle Bus&f. This allows a section of the network on the other side of the bus to come online only when the bus is powered by redstone, or to go offline if using an &einverted&f toggle bus.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.crafting: When applied as an upgrade to any supported device such as an Interface or Export Bus, the &bCrafting Card&f allows the device in question to automatically send out its own crafting requests for a required (filtered) item. Crafting CPUs can be set to respond only to these requests to prevent taking up CPUs meant for player-requested crafts. \n \n When the &eLevel Emitter&f is upgraded with the Crafting Card, it can be configured to emit redstone in order to directly facilitate in crafting, by emitting a signal either &owhile&r a crafting job for its given item is detected or specifically &oto&r craft the item. The latter would apply for cases where the only thing needed to make a given item is a redstone signal, without even requiring a crafting pattern.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.crafting_storage: Before you can carry out an auto-crafting job, you need a device to actually store the request itself along with any interim items for multi-step crafts. This device is known as a &ecrafting CPU&f. \n \n A crafting CPU is a multiblock structure requiring at least one &bCrafting Storage&f block, optionally along with any other Crafting Unit. The multiblock can be made in any size, but must be a solid cuboid in order to form and function accordingly.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.crafting_coprocessor: The &bCrafting Co-Processing Unit&f helps speed up crafting jobs by allowing pattern providers to either send items out to their connected devices faster or to work concurrently to make multiple required ingredients. \n \n The base AE2 co-processor provides one co-processor 'thread' to assist this, while the co-processing unit from &dMEGA Cells&f provides 4 threads in a single such block.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.crafting_monitor: The &bCrafting Monitor&f displays the overall item being crafted, along with the remaining quantity of that item still being crafted. \n \n Both the base AE2 monitor and the MEGA monitor function identically, but are provided for aesthetic purposes.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.IO:
To make life that much easier, AE2 provides a whole suite of devices for the manipulation of ME data, i.e. moving stored items around the world. 
 
 The &bME Interface&f is one of these devices. As an input device, the Interface allows any item/fluid/etc to be piped externally through it, which is then automatically stored in the ME Network that the interface is connected to. 
 
 As an output device, the Interface can be configured to keep a certain available amount of a stored item in stock, from the ME network to its own internal inventory. This allows items to then be received by some external source like another player or some pipe.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.import_bus: The &bME Import Bus&f periodically sucks items in from whatever external storage the bus is facing. It can optionally be filtered to only take in certain items from said inventory.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.annhilation_plane:
The &bME Annihilation Plane&f can be used to automatically break any blocks in front of it and return anything dropped by the block directly to the ME network. 
 
 As an added bonus, the Annihilation Plane can be enchanted in the same way as a regular digging tool, affecting block drops in the same way as that enchanted tool would. This makes it ideal for processing ore blocks when enchanted with Fortune, for example. 
 Any added enchantments significantly increase the amount of energy used by the plane every time a block is broken. Enchanting the plane with &eEfficiency&f will decrease the overall energy use incurred by all other enchantments, while the &eUnbreaking&f enchantment gives the plane the chance to only use any energy sometimes, similarly to Unbreaking on regular tools.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.storage_bus: The &bME Storage Bus&f, when facing some external storage container, will allow the container to be used as though it were part of the ME network, allowing items to be taken out from the container or inserted into it purely via ME. \n \n Storage buses can be filtered and given specific priorities such that specific items will try to go to the attached storage first, however it will not retroactively move any filtered items from anywhere else in the network to its attached storage.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.capacity: The &bCapacity Card&f allows a bus upgraded with it to carry a larger filter. Import and Export buses upgraded with capacity cards can go from supporting only one filtered item each to their maximum nine-slot filter, while Storage buses will go from 18 slots to a maximum of 63.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.cards: The &bFuzzy Card&f allows a filtered item to be matched regardless of any (NBT) metadata such as damage or enchantments, while the &bInverter Card&f toggles the filter on such buses from being a whitelist to being a blacklist.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.export_bus: The &bME Export Bus&f periodically spits items in its whitelist filter out to whatever external storage the bus is facing. Unlike the Import Bus, the Export Bus cannot work without being filtered.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.formation_plane: The &bME Formation Plane&f acts similarly to the Storage Bus, but treats the world itself as its storage medium. In other words, it will place down any block in its filter directly in front of itself. \n \n This can be useful for situations where a block can be processed simply by placing it and breaking it with a certain tool.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.P2P:
&bP2P&f (peer-to-peer) is a powerful system within AE2, allowing for the transfer of items, fluids and even more without the need for any intermediary ME storage. 
 
 Right-clicking on a P2P tunnel with certain items will &eattune&f the tunnel into one capable of transferring something else, such as items through pipes, energy through cables, redstone signals and (by default) even ME connections themselves. 
 
 P2P tunnels must be linked to one another with the use of a &eMemory Card&f, detailed in the next quest.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.memory: The &bMemory Card&f is a tool with two different functions. The simplest of the two is to save various devices' configurations (such as whitelist filters) to be copied over to another device of the same kind. \n \n The second function of a memory card is to link &eP2P tunnels&f together. When doing so, the P2P tunnel being linked will be assigned a unique ID, which is stored on the memory card for further linking.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.fiber:
An important concept within AE2 is a technique known as '&esubnetting&f', wherein an extra separate ME network (a &esubnetwork&f) acts in conjunction with the main network to perform some specialised function or process. 
 
 What separates a subnetwork from a completely detached separate network is usually the use of the &bQuartz Fiber&f as a cable part. When placed between two otherwise unconnected lengths of cable, the Quartz Fiber transfers no data or channels between the two whatsoever, instead only transmitting power. 
 
 Thus, a subnetwork on the other side of the Fiber can be powered wholly by the main network's power source, without requiring any extra dedicated powergen.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.spatial:
Aside from the storage of items and fluids, AE2 also provides a native way of storing entire &estructures&f inside of storage cells, not too dissimilarly to the Compact Machines mod. 
 
 The &bSpatial IO Port&f allows structures contained within a &bSpatial Containment Structure&f to be captured within a specially-designed storage cell, activated via a redstone signal. 
 
 If a mob or player happens to stand inside of the SCS while the space is being captured, they too will be transported to where the rest of the space goes, i.e. in a dedicated dimension. Just make sure you have a way to get back out and in if you're the one being captured.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.pylon:
The Spatial Containment Structure (SCS) consists of a cage of &bSpatial Pylons&f covering the volume you wish to enclose in a Spatial IO cell. At the absolute minimum, an SCS requires three lines of spatial pylon blocks, one for each dimension of the space being contained (length, width, height). 
 
 However, Spatial IO is an extremely power-hungry feature, especially when trying to capture much larger spaces (up to 128x128x128). Having more spatial pylons included in the SCS around the desired volume will increase its overall &eefficiency&f, allowing it to use less energy to capture. 
 
 Also, be mindful that each individual pylon (regardless of its length) takes up one channel. For particularly large spaces, you may wish to build a dedicated network with a controller to fit all the required pylons.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.SSC:
&bSpatial Storage Cells&f are used to hold one defined volume each, and come in three different capacities allowing for a maximum of 2x2x2, 16x16x16 and 128x128x128 blocks' worth of space. 
 
 Upon encoding, a cell is allocated a section of space within the spatial storage &edimension&f, along with a unique ID corresponding to the region allocated to the cell. An encoded cell can still be used within the Spatial IO Port to retrieve any stored blocks and entities. 
 
 From then on, any blocks contained either within the cell's region of space or in an SCS with the same size as the one used for the initial encoding can be moved back into the overworld or into the spatial dimension respectively. If there are blocks both within the spatial region and within the SCS, these will simply swap places accordingly.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.Sanchor: The &bSpatial Anchor&f is a companion device from the Spatial IO lineage that simply functions as a chunk loader. When connected to an ME network, the Anchor will force-load all the chunks occupied by the ME network across all cables and devices, excluding subnetworks, as long as the network remains powered.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.wireless_AP: The next thing to make to allow for wireless network access is the &bME Wireless Access Point&f. The Access Point is used to open the network to wireless access via a &ewireless terminal&f, and has a set (finite) range depending on how many &bWireless Boosters&f are inserted into the access point.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.wireless_terminal:
The &bWireless Terminal&f functions identically to a regular terminal, but wirelessly. 
 
 Before it can be used to access a network, it must first be &elinked&f to the network by placing it into the top-right slot of the &eWireless Access Point&r. If it is not linked to a network, or is out of either range or power, the terminal will not function. 
 
 Wireless terminals can also be upgraded with &eEnergy Cards&f to provide a larger internal battery.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.quantumbridge: To get infinite range with your wireless terminal, you need a quantum bridge card. First build a quantum ring, then add the quantum bridge card to your wireless terminal, and a singularity to both the quantum ring and your wireless terminal.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.matter:
As for wirelessly expanding the ME Network itself, the first step is admittedly somewhat unorthodox. 
 
 The &bMatter Condenser&f is AE2's take on a trash can, voiding any items inserted into it. When fitted with a &eStorage Component&f, however, the condenser can harness some left-over energy from the item being voided and store it to make two special crafting items out of enough concentrated energy. 
 
 The first of these two items is the &bMatter Ball&f, requiring at least a 1k storage component and 256 items' worth of voided material.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.antimatter: When using a 64k storage component or higher, the Matter Condenser becomes able to condense significantly more to produce a &bSingularity&f. A single singularity requires 256000 items to be voided. That's exactly &o4000 stacks&r! \n \n See what happens when you throw this singularity on the ground with a piece of &eender dust&f. You'll have to deal some damage to the surroundings while you're at it, but thankfully AE2 offers its own &bTiny TNT&f to minimise that.
atm9.quest.ae2.desc.quantum: If you did that last quest correctly, you should have turned that singularity into a pair of &bQuantum Entangled Singularities&f. These new singularities are used to link together a ring-shaped device known as a &eQuantum Network Bridge&f. \n \n When two of these individual rings have been linked using the Quantum Entangled Singularities and jumpstarted with some AE power (e.g. an energy cell), an ME network can be expanded wirelessly on the other side of the bridge, across either long distances or even dimensions.
atm9.quest.ae2.subt.fiber: This has a use outside of crafting cables.
atm9.quest.ae2.subt.wireless_terminal: This is what you're here for
atm9.quest.ae2.subt.ininfity: I'm not writing the Toy Story line
atm9.quest.rs.desc.refined:
&9Refined Storage&r is a mass storage mod that offers a network-based storage system. 
 
 To get started with the mod, you'll want to make the &6Controller&r. 
 
 The Controller is the 'Core' of your storage network. When provided with power, it gives life to all RS components connected. Each network can only have one Controller.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.security:
The &9Security Manager&r allows you to grant access and permissions to users within your network. 
 
 When placed in your system, you'll need to create a &9Security Card&r for each player you'd like to configure permissions for. When no cards are present, everyone has access to all permissions. 
 
 To restrict permissions and access to all unconfigured players, configure a card that isn't bound to a player and put it into the manager. The person who placed the Security Manager will always have access to it.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.grid:
Because of the Controller limit, you'll probably end up wanting to connect different systems to your main hub without a billion cables connecting them. 
 
 This is done using &6Network Transmitters&r and &6Receivers&r. 
 
 &9Transmitters&r should be connected to your main system, wherever your Controller is. 
 
 The &9Receiver&r should go wherever you want your external network to be. For example, this can be a separate part of your base where you have Bees, a mob farm, etc. 
 
 To connect the Receiver to your main network, you'll need to use a &eNetwork Card&r. To bind the Network Card, right-click on the Network Receiver, and then place the Network Card into the Network Transmitter that is attached to your main system.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.transmitter: To connect the Receiver to your main network, you'll need to use a &eNetwork Card&r. To bind the Network Card, right-click on the Network Receiver, and then place the Network Card into the Network Transmitter that is attached to your main system.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.cables: &9Cables&r are used to connect blocks and items to your system. \n \n In the beginning, you can get by with placing blocks next to each other to connect them to your system, but Cables allow you to extend out! This is a staple for any Refined Storage Network.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.speeding: The &9Speed Upgrade&r does exactly what it says it does. It will increase the speed at which the interface/block works. Need an importer to pull faster? Want your crafters to work faster? This is the upgrade! \n \n The &6Stack Upgrade&r increases the speed of transfer by a stack of items rather than just one. Combine with Speed Upgrades!
atm9.quest.rs.desc.external:
This type of cable interface is probably the most important item one can make in their Refined Storage journey. 
 
 This type of cable interface connects an external storage to your Refined Storage Network. It basically lets RS look into the storage container to let you access it within your grid! 
 
 This works on many things, including but not limited to: Chests, Barrels, Drawers, Drawer Controllers, and more! 
 
 If you can't make drives and have a bunch of chests everywhere, this is your best bet in creating a storage Network!
atm9.quest.rs.desc.monitor: When connected to your system, this block will display the current number of an item within your network.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.filter: The &9Filter&r is an item used in a Grid to specify which items or fluids can be visible.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.destructor: This interface will automatically break the block it is attached to. \n \n You can also set it to whitelist blocks, which is useful for automating certain processes, like making casings in Create.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.destructor_upgrade: These upgrades add enchantments to your Destructor. \n \n Wondering why you would use this? Imagine having a Builder or Quarry pump Silk-Touched Ores into your system. You can have a Constructor place these ores, then a Destructor with Fortune on it to break it for even more raw ores.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.eliteD: Has 18 filter slots and works 2x faster.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.ultraD: Has 36 filter slots and works 6x faster.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.constructor: This interface will place the designated block in the direction it is pointed. \n \n You can designate the block within the GUI. This is useful for automation!
atm9.quest.rs.desc.importer:
The &9Importer&r is used to pull items from a connected block. 
 
 For example, you can use these on Furnaces to pull the finished product out into your system. 
 
 Make sure to grab some &6Speed&r or &6Stack&r upgrades for them! 
 
 You can also filter what items are pulled. Need more filter slots? Upgrade it!
atm9.quest.rs.desc.exporter:
The &9Exporter&r is used to push items from your system into a block from your Network storage. 
 
 This can be used to fill Furnaces with ores or fuel, push materials into designated chests, etc. 
 
 You can also filter what items are pushed. Need more filter slots? Upgrade it!
atm9.quest.rs.desc.eliteE: Has 9 more filter slots and is 2x faster than the regular Exporter.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.ultraE: Has 27 more filter slots and is 6x faster than the regular Exporter. Also has the Stack Upgrade integrated.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.upgrades:
The &9Regulator Upgrade&r allows you to maintain a certain amount of items within a block or machine. A great example of this is telling your network that you want to keep 64 Coal within a Furnace. You'd place the upgrade in the exporter attached to the furnace, and set it to 64. Your system will then try to keep the furnace full of fuel! 
 
 But what if you need an item that is crafted? The &9Crafting Upgrade&r does exactly this. If you have the recipe learned inside of a crafter, adding this upgrade to an interface will let it know to craft it if you run out. 
 
 Using our example from before, let's say we have a Mystical Ag farm going and have Coal Essence. We can then put the Coal recipe in a crafter connected to our system, then place this upgrade in the same exporter that is keeping the Furnace fueled. If you run out of Coal in your system, the crafting upgrade allows your system to craft some more!
atm9.quest.rs.desc.virtual_storage: To store your items, you'll need to create disks that are stored in a &aDisk Drive&r. You can attach this to your network by placing it beside your Controller, or by using pipes. \n \n These have 8 slots for Storage Drives.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.disk_manipulator: Allows you to take items and fluids from one disk into another grid's disks.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.housing: It's time to create the 'Hard Drives' of Refined Storage. To do this, we'll need a &9Storage Housing&r that we'll combine with a &aStorage Part&r to create a &dStorage Disk&r. Just simply make the desired size of the part, then combine with the housing to create a disk. \n \n The Storage Disk is used to store your items virtually once placed inside of the Disk Drive. It has to be put in a Disk Drive. The Storage Disk won’t despawn when dropped in the world.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.1kstorage: The 1k Storage Disk can store 1000 items.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.4kstorage: The 4k Storage Disk can store 4000 items.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.16kstorage: The 16k Storage Disk can store 16000 items.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.64kstorage: The 64k Storage Disk can store 64000 items.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.64kfluid: The 64k Fluid Storage Part is used to craft the 64k Fluid Storage Disk.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.256kfluid: The 64k Fluid Storage Part is used to craft the 64k Fluid Storage Disk.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.1024kfluid: The 1024k Fluid Storage Part is used to craft the 1024k Fluid Storage Disk.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.4096kfluid: The 4096k Fluid Storage Part is used to craft the 4096k Fluid Storage Disk.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.1kstorage_block:
Don't like storing things in drives? 
 
 You can create storage &9Blocks&r instead and just slap the block down somewhere in your system. 
 
 Whatever items end up in the block will be stored inside whenever you break it as well. 
 
 If you want to un-craft it, you can sneak right click while holding it.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.advanced_housing: It's like the regular one but ADVANCED. \n \n These are used to house the larger Disk Drives.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.256kstorage: The 256k Storage Disk can store 256000 items.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.1024kstorage: The 1024k Storage Disk can store 1024000 items.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.4096kstorage: The 4096k Storage Disk can store 4096000 items.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.16384kstorage: The 16384k Storage Disk can store 16384000 items.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.65536kstorage: The 65536k Storage Disk can store 65536000 items.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.262mstorage: The 262m Storage Disk can store.... well....  262m items.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.1048mstorage: You won't believe this. \n \n The 1048m Storage Disk can store 1048m items.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.16384kfluid: The 16384k Fluid Storage Part is used to craft the 16384k Fluid Storage Disk.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.65536kfluid: The 65536k Fluid Storage Part is used to craft the 65536k Fluid Storage Disk.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.262mfluid: The 262m Fluid Storage Part is used to craft the 262m Fluid Storage Disk.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.1048mfluid: The 1048m Fluid Storage Part is used to craft the 1048m Fluid Storage Disk.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.network: Great! We can store items virtually, but how do we see what is on the network? \n \n To access the system, you'll need to create a &9Grid&r. The Grid is the most basic form of 'Display' for the items in your inventory.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.crafting_grid: This lets you access your storage, but with a crafting table! \n \n Let's be honest, no one just uses regular Grids.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.portable_grid: The Portable Grid is a portable storage that isn’t connected to a network. It allows you to interact with a Storage Disk while not being connected to a network.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.fluid_grid: Plan on storing Liquids? You'll need a &9Fluid Grid&r to be able to see what fluids you have in your Fluid Disks.  \n \n Pro Tip: If you want to store gases from Mekanism, see if you can turn it into a liquid first using a Rotary Condensentrator.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.autocrafting: &9Patterns&r are the bread and butter of autocrafting. These store recipes to let your RS network know how to craft items.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.pattern_grid:
This grid allows you to imprint recipes onto patterns for your network. 
 
 The easiest way to create a recipe for a pattern is to look up the item in JEI, then click the '+' button in the bottom right of the recipe. This will then place the recipe into the grid. 
 
 On the right side, the top slot is used for storing blank Patterns. With a blank Pattern inside, you should be able to click the Arrow underneath to imprint the recipe onto the pattern. 
 
 You'll then want to put the Pattern into a crafter!
atm9.quest.rs.desc.crafting_monitor: When attached to your system, the &9Crafting Monitor&r allows you to see what items are currently in your crafting queue. \n \n You'll need one of these if you want to be able to cancel crafts that aren't working or are bugged.
atm9.quest.rs.desc.crafter: The &9Crafter&r is how we store patterns for our Network to know how to craft items. Once a recipe is placed into the crafter, you'll be able to 'Request' an item to be crafted from your Grid. You can do this by hitting CTRL+Shift when clicking on the item you have a recipe for to bring up the crafting GUI. \n \n This block can also be placed facing a machine to use &6Processing Patterns&r. For example, if you point the Crafter at a Furnace, you can put a recipe inside for a recipe you need a furnace for, like smelting raw processors. As long as the crafter is attached to your system and the Furnace has an importer attached to it, the Crafter will allow you to request the smelted version of the Processor!
